name: service
description: The details of the services provided by organizations to a range of different groups.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the service. Each service must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization that provides this service.

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.title: Program Identifier
program_id.description: The identifier of the program this service is delivered under.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The official or public name of the service.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: An (optional) alternative name for this service.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the service.
description.example: Counselling Services provided by trained professionals. Suitable for people with mental health conditions such as anxiety, depression, or eating disorders as well as people experiencing difficult life events and circumstances.

additional_urls.name: additional_urls
additional_urls.title: Additional URLs
additional_urls.description: The details of additional URLs for the service

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: An email address which can be used to contact the service provider.

status.name: status
status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the service which can be active, inactive, defunct, or temporarily closed.

interpretation_services.name: interpretation_services
interpretation_services.title: Interpretation Services
interpretation_services.description: A free text description of any interpretation services available for accessing this service.
interpretation_services.example: Interpretation services are available in Urdu, Polish, and Slovak

application_process.name: application_process
application_process.title: Application Process
application_process.description: A free text description of the steps needed to access this service.
application_process.example: If you are an NHS patient please ask your GP for a referral letter, we will then be in touch with you directly. If you are not an NHS patient you should ring our reception to arrange an appointment

fees_description.name: fees_description
fees_description.title: Fees Description
fees_description.description: A free text description of any charges for service users to access this service.
fees_description.example: Non-NHS patients are expected to pay for their counselling sessions. We charge a flat rate per hour of counselling. The current rate is Â£50 per hour. Please see our website for up to date prices.

wait_time.name: wait_time
wait_time.title: Wait Time
wait_time.description: DEPRECATED: The time a client may expect to wait before receiving a service.

fees.name: fees
fees.title: Fees
fees.description: DEPRECATED: Details of any charges for service users to access this service.

accreditations.name: accreditations
accreditations.title: Accreditations
accreditations.description: A free text description of any accreditations. Accreditation is the formal evaluation of an organization or program against best practice standards set by an accrediting organization.
accreditations.example: All of our practitioners are accredited by the BASC, UKCP, and the Professional Standards Body

eligibility_description.name: eligibility_description
eligibility_description.title: Eligibility Description
eligibility_description.description: A free text description of the type of person for whom this service is intended.
eligibility_description.example: This service is intended for all people aged 12 and over who require counselling services in the MyCity area

minimum_age.name: minimum_age
minimum_age.title: Minimum Age
minimum_age.description: The minimum age of a person required to meet this eligibility requirement.

maximum_age.name: maximum_age
maximum_age.title: Maximum Age
maximum_age.description: The maximum age of a person required to meet this eligibility requirement.

assured_date.name: assured_date
assured_date.title: Assured Date
assured_date.description: The date that the information about the service was last checked.

assurer_email.name: assurer_email
assurer_email.title: Assurer Email
assurer_email.description: The contact e-mail address for the person or organization which last assured the service.

licenses.name: licenses
licenses.title: Licenses
licenses.description: DEPRECATED: An organization may have a license issued by a government entity to operate legally. A list of any such licenses can be provided here.

alert.name: alert
alert.title: Alert
alert.description: A description of any short term alerts concerning the service.
alert.example: Following COVID-19 we have moved most of our counselling sessions online. Please contact the reception if you require further information.

last_modified.name: last_modified
last_modified.title: Last Modified
last_modified.description: The datetime when the service, or any related information about the service, has changed. Should have millisecond accuracy.

phones.name: phones
phones.title: Phones
phones.description: The details of the telephone numbers used to contact organizations, services, and locations.

schedules.name: schedules
schedules.title: Schedules
schedules.description: The details of when a service or location is open. Entries are RFC 5545 RRULES.

service_areas.name: service_areas
service_areas.title: Service Areas
service_areas.description: The details of the geographic area for which a service is available.

service_at_locations.name: service_at_locations
service_at_locations.title: Service At Locations
service_at_locations.description: A link between a service and a specific location.

languages.name: languages
languages.title: Languages
languages.description: The details of the languages that are spoken at locations or services. This does not include languages which can only be used with interpretation.

organization.name: organization
organization.title: Organization
organization.description: The details about each organization delivering services. Each service should be linked to the organization responsible for its delivery. One organization may deliver many services.

funding.name: funding
funding.title: Funding
funding.description: The sources of funding for a service or organization.

cost_options.name: cost_options
cost_options.title: Cost Options
cost_options.description: The costs of a service at certain points in time. This is an LGA Extension table. This table provides a structured version of the text information contained in the 'fees' field of the 'service' table.

program.name: program
program.title: Program
program.description: The details of collections of related services.

required_documents.name: required_documents
required_documents.title: Required Documents
required_documents.description: The details of any documents that are required in order to access or use services.

contacts.name: contacts
contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: The details of the named contacts for services and organizations.

capacities.name: capacities
capacities.title: Capacities
capacities.description: The details of capacities of this service. See `service_capacity`.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
